articles.title: UnionBank confirms talks with Citi on PH consumer banking business acquisition - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The American banking giant announced earlier in April its consumer banking exit in the Philippines and 12 other markets as it hopes to channel investments and resources to business with the largest scale and growth potential.
articles.content: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 2) UnionBank of the Philippines has confirmed it is in discussions with Citigroup Inc. (Citi) on potentially acquiring its consumer banking business in the Phi… [+1177 chars]

articles.title: US Supreme Court signals willingness to curtail abortion rights in America - Sky News
Longer interval between COVID-19 mRNA vaccine doses leads to stronger immune response - News-Medical.net
articles.description: The first peer-reviewed study in North America examining the timing between the first and second doses of COVID-19 mRNA vaccines shows that a longer dose interval leads to a stronger immune response. The study is funded by the Government of Canada through its…
